title: Authors and Citation
text: Rustler M (2022). tv: R Package TV (Tarifvertrag). R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://github.com/mrustl/tv.
code: @Manual{,   title = {tv: R Package for TV (Tarifvertrag)},   author = {Michael Rustler},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://github.com/mrustl/tv}, }

title: R Package for TV (Tarifvertrag)
text: installing latest release R package run following code :
code: # Enable repository from mrustl options(repos = c(   kwbr = 'https://mrustl.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))    # Download and install 'tv' in R install.packages('tv')  # Browse the 'tv' manual pages help(package = 'tv')

title: Get Salaries — get_salaries
code: get_salaries(   years = 2000:2022,   union_rate = "tv-l",   area = "west",   type = 1,   dbg = TRUE )

title: Get Salaries — get_salaries
text: years years tariffs try download (default: 2000:2022) union_rate default: "tv-l" area default: "west" type 1: Monatswerte, 12: Jahreswerte, 3: Quartalswerte, "w": Wochenwerte, "t": Tageswerte, "v": werktagswerte (default: 1) dbg print debug

title: Get Salaries — get_salaries
code: salaries <- get_salaries(years = 2010:2020) #> Getting 'monthly' salary table for 'tv-l' ('west') for year 2010 ... ok. (1.44s)  #> Getting 'monthly' salary table for 'tv-l' ('west') for year 2011 ... ok. (0.96s)  #> Getting 'monthly' salary table for 'tv-l' ('west') for year 2012 ... ok. (0.98s)  #> Getting 'monthly' salary table for 'tv-l' ('west') for year 2013 ... ok. (0.92s)  #> Getting 'monthly' salary table for 'tv-l' ('west') for year 2014 ... ok. (0.96s)  #> Getting 'monthly' salary table for 'tv-l' ('west') for year 2015 ... ok. (0.89s)  #> Getting 'monthly' salary table for 'tv-l' ('west') for year 2016 ... ok. title: Get Salary — get_salary
text: year year tariff (default: 2009) union_rate default: "tv-l" area default: "west" type 1: Monatswerte, 12: Jahreswerte, 3: Quartalswerte, "w": Wochenwerte, "t": Tageswerte, "v": werktagswerte (default: 1)

title: Get Salary — get_salary
code: get_salary() #> # A tibble: 108 × 9 #>    pay_group  step salary unit  title          area  year  date_from  date_to    #>    <chr>     <int>  <dbl> <chr> <chr>          <chr> <chr> <date>     <date>     #>  1 E 1           1    NA  €     Entgelttabell… west  2009  2009-03-01 2010-02-28 #>  2 E 1           2  1406. €     Entgelttabell… west  2009  2009-03-01 2010-02-28 #>  3 E 1           3  1432. €     Entgelttabell… west  2009  2009-03-01 2010-02-28 #>  4 E 1           4  1463. €     Entgelttabell… west  2009  2009-03-01 2010-02-28 #>  5 E 1           5  1494. €     Entgelttabell… west  2009  2009-03-01 2010-02-28 #>  6 E 1           6  1571. €     Entgelttabell… west  2009  2009-03-01 2010-02-28 #>  7 E 2           1  1581. €     Entgelttabell… west  2009  2009-03-01 2010-02-28 #>  8 E 2           2  1751  €     Entgelttabell… west  2009  2009-03-01 2010-02-28 #>  9 E 2           3  1802. €     Entgelttabell… west  2009  2009-03-01 2010-02-28 #> 10 E 2           4  1854  €     Entgelttabell… west  2009  2009-03-01 2010-02-28 #> # … with 98 more rows

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.
